title: Suggestion strip
content:
On my previous phone I would get a red line and put suggestion drop down menu to fix misspelled words and phrases. All I can get now is this suggestion strip along the bottom which generally just gives you put an ing or ed at the end of the existing word.

Example is  I went too the store 2 buy to ice cream.  

There's phrase would be underlined in red previously and multiple suggestions of the same phrase would appear. I could top one and it would change the phrase. That is gone now.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 5
